summary: Merchoid Reveals Limited-Edition Avengers Jackets
title: Merchoid Reveals Limited-Edition Avengers Jackets
body:
Merchoid, who recently got a lot of attention for those cool Avengers “Advanced Tech” hoodies, has just revealed some new limited-edition Avengers jackets to celebrate the 1963 debut of the team.

These new Avengers jackets are designed after Captain America, Spider-Man, Thor, or Black Panther and are limited to just 1,963 pieces:

The jackets are officially licensed by Marvel and are available on…

summary: Avengers: Endgame IMAX Comparison Trailer Released
title: Avengers: Endgame IMAX Comparison Trailer Released
body:
#AvengersEndgame IMAX Comparison Trailer Released

If you saw Aquaman on an IMAX screen back in December, you probably saw the IMAX version of the Avengers: Endgame trailer. Now, IMAX has officially released a side-by-side comparison of the normal trailer and the IMAX one so you can can see how much more picture you get in the IMAX version.

Just like with Avengers: Infinity War, Joe and Anthony Russo shot Avengers: Endgameentirely on IMAX…

View On WordPress

summary:
okay, stick with me here.  
we all know Steve and Bucky are absolute assholes to each other, like honestly who isn’t an asshole...
body:
okay, stick with me here.

we all know Steve and Bucky are absolute assholes to each other, like honestly who isn’t an asshole to their best friend right?and we alll know that Peter is literally tiny Steve?? like… that’s just how it is mkay. STICK WITH ME.

SO we all headcanon that Bucky and Sam are assholes to Peter because Seb and Anthony are assholes to Tom.

BUt what ifff Bucky’s an asshole to Peter because Peter reminds him of Steve so like that’s his only way of communicating that he cares for Peter.

Like.. imagine Peter taking everything personally, thinking that Bucky just hates him and he tells Tony and Tony tell Steve and Steve’s like ‘oHhhh…’ and like he tells Bucky and Bucky has to remember that Peter isn’t angry like Steve and hey talk and then the next day Bucks an as but then Peter gets him back??

Idk I just need this??

summary: Still Super: ‘Avengers’ Is Forecast to Set Box-Office Record
title: Still Super: ‘Avengers’ Is Forecast to Set Box-Office Record
excerpt: One expert predicts $282 million in North American ticket sales, topping the $258 million mark set last year by “Avengers: Infinity War.”
description: It’s really going to come down to word-of-mouth. Infinity War became a ‘must-see’ movie because of the ending, and a lot of people that wouldn’t normally have gone to see it (or see it opening weekend) went to see it simply because everyone kept saying you had to see that ending. If Endgame is able to generate the same you have to see this fervor that IW did, then it might be possible, although I think $282 mil is a little generous.

Infinity War became a ‘must-see’ movie because of the ending, and a lot of people that wouldn’t normally have gone to see it (or see it opening weekend) went to see it simply because everyone kept saying you had to see that ending. If Endgame is able to generate the same you have to see this fervor that IW did, then it might be possible, although I think $282 mil is a little generous.

If Endgame is able to generate the same you have to see this fervor that IW did, then it might be possible, although I think $282 mil is a little generous.

title: Avengers: Endgame is Predicted to Decimate Box Office Records With a $282 Million Opening
body:
#AvengersEndgame is Predicted to Decimate Box Office Records With a $282 Million Opening

Last summer, Avengers: Infinity War broke all box office records by delivering the biggest opening weekend of all time. Now that Thanos has wiped out half of the universe and left people wanting to know how the Avengers reverse the decimation, the sequel is predicted to be even bigger.

According to a new article from Bloomberg, a box office researcher predicts that Avengers: Endgame is going to…

blog.name: fandomeats
blog.title: Fandom Eats
blog.description: Making Fandom Themed foods, baked goods, and drinks! Recipes and Pictures!

summary: We bought the Captain America shield cake pan set from Disney Eats and wanted to give it a shot for our viewers. There were no...
caption:
We bought the Captain America shield cake pan set from Disney Eats and wanted to give it a shot for our viewers. There were no real instructions given on how to assemble this cake or how much batter to use, and there were definitely no reviews (at the time we filmed this) to help us out! 

So here we are! This is part three of three: Final product! 

 Recipe for Red dough brought to you buy Sally’s Baking Addiciton: https://sallysbakingaddiction.com/fun… (doubt it, minus the sprinkles, add in as much red food dye as you need to get your dough as red as you want) 

 Recipe for Blue and White: https://iambaker.net/white-cake-cookies/ (add as much blue to the second batch as you need to get it as blue as you want!) 

 You will also need:  three jars of frosting, or two jars split up,  red and blue dye, and white fondant for your Star (or just trace more white frosting into the star cutter).

body:
Avengers: Endgame, Alan Silvestri ha condiviso una foto dietro le quinte

Il compositore di Avengers: Endgame, il grandissimo Alan Silvestri, ha condiviso una foto dietro le quinte del lavoro svolto per l’opera corale firmata Marvel Studios.

Il celebre compositore Alan Silvestri tornerà come creativo dietro lo spartito per Avengers: Endgame, dopo il magistrale lavoro fatto in Avengers: Infinity War, e come prova di ciò il maestro ha recentemente condiviso un’immagine…

blog.name: xarles56
blog.title: Fan of Fury's super-secret boy band
blog.description: Tina | She/her | We stan Tony Stark in this house | Multishipping hoe | AO3:  tina_v

tags: this is less ridiculous than some of the ‘leaks’ out there
im so done with it all
summary:
ENDGAME PLOT LEAK:
Thanos comes to his senses and realizes that his whole plan was utterly stupid and he can just double the...
body:
I’m seeing all this fake plot leaks for Endgame lately and they’re all depressing and horrible so I’m like if you’re gonna make something up how about

ENDGAME PLOT LEAK:

Thanos comes to his senses and realizes that his whole plan was utterly stupid and he can just double the resources and decides to bring everybody back because Myyyyy Gamooooorrraaaaaaa.

Thanos also brings back Loki because he knows fans love the shit out of that little asshole but Loki turns into a snake and follows Thor around silently, then waits until the sun rises to transform and yells at Thor “Told you the sun would shine on us again, brother! YEET!” (He doesn’t know what it means but he finds the word funny. Humans are so dumb)

Everybody is alive and well and T’Challa, Peter and Stephen have some shawarma while they talk about their upcoming sequels. They’re all very excited. Except Wong, he’s been waiting an entire movie for a motherfucking tuna sandwich and he’s pissed.

Pepper gets fed up and she’s like ‘you know what? fuck it I’m putting on my suit which Tony obviously made for me a long time ago (he likes to protect people he loves with tech suits, ie Peter) and I’m using the StarkFindingFriends to locate my hubby’.

She does and she gets Tony and Nebula safely to Earth because Pepper is a fucking badass.

The Guardians fly off to bring back James Gunn because he’s been snapped by Disney and they’re even more powerful than all the six fucking infinity stones put together so God knows where the fuck they’ve sent him.

All the original Avengers meet up and there’s a unicorn and a rainbow in the sky behind them and ALL IS HAPPY AND WELL FOR ONCE IN THIS MOTHERFUCKING CINEMATIC UNIVERSE RUN BY PSYCOPATHS.

When Tony sees Bucky he asks what kind of conditioner he’s been using back in Wakanda because his hair doesn’t look as dirty and he has no more split ends. They both have a laugh about that crazy shit that went down in Siberia and hug because all it’s forgiven.

Bruce finally realizes he’s never ever ever EEEEEVER gonna get a smarter, hotter chick than Nat and decides to cut the ‘we can’t be together’ bullshit. Everybody in the wedding is dressed in green and drunk off their asses so it’s kind of like Saint Patrick’s day and it’s AWESOME.

Then Tony meets with Steve, who offers his arm to Tony when he has to go up the compound’s slippery stairs because he’s such a sweetheart, really, and makes him pot of coffee. They sit down and make amends. They team up to lock up the Russo bothers in the floating prison facility from Civil War so they can never fuck things up again.

Peter finally gets to hug Tony properly and Tony promises they can go as Marty McFly and Doc for Halloween next year. Peter then follows Tony around saying ‘Doooc! you don’t just walk into a store and buy plutonium, Dooooc!’. Tony instantly regrets it. Pepper is laughing her ass off, totally thrilled.

Captain Marvel then is like you guys have done enough, 10 fucking years doing this shit sounds exhausting so I’ll take it from here. Tony please look after my cute cat I hear you like cats and she flies away with her super awesome flying flames and shit.

Clint gets his family back and Laura decides to adopt the OG Avengers because they’re cute so they all go to live at Clint’s farm. Steve rips logs in half with his bare hands while Tony fixes the tractor and plays with his son Morgan.

THE END.

You’re welcome.

reblog.comment:
I’m seeing all this fake plot leaks for Endgame lately and they’re all depressing and horrible so I’m like if you’re gonna make something up how about

ENDGAME PLOT LEAK:

Thanos comes to his senses and realizes that his whole plan was utterly stupid and he can just double the resources and decides to bring everybody back because Myyyyy Gamooooorrraaaaaaa.

Thanos also brings back Loki because he knows fans love the shit out of that little asshole but Loki turns into a snake and follows Thor around silently, then waits until the sun rises to transform and yells at Thor “Told you the sun would shine on us again, brother! YEET!” (He doesn’t know what it means but he finds the word funny. Humans are so dumb)

Everybody is alive and well and T’Challa, Peter and Stephen have some shawarma while they talk about their upcoming sequels. They’re all very excited. Except Wong, he’s been waiting an entire movie for a motherfucking tuna sandwich and he’s pissed.

Pepper gets fed up and she’s like ‘you know what? fuck it I’m putting on my suit which Tony obviously made for me a long time ago (he likes to protect people he loves with tech suits, ie Peter) and I’m using the StarkFindingFriends to locate my hubby’.

She does and she gets Tony and Nebula safely to Earth because Pepper is a fucking badass.

The Guardians fly off to bring back James Gunn because he’s been snapped by Disney and they’re even more powerful than all the six fucking infinity stones put together so God knows where the fuck they’ve sent him.

All the original Avengers meet up and there’s a unicorn and a rainbow in the sky behind them and ALL IS HAPPY AND WELL FOR ONCE IN THIS MOTHERFUCKING CINEMATIC UNIVERSE RUN BY PSYCOPATHS.

When Tony sees Bucky he asks what kind of conditioner he’s been using back in Wakanda because his hair doesn’t look as dirty and he has no more split ends. They both have a laugh about that crazy shit that went down in Siberia and hug because all it’s forgiven.

Bruce finally realizes he’s never ever ever EEEEEVER gonna get a smarter, hotter chick than Nat and decides to cut the ‘we can’t be together’ bullshit. Everybody in the wedding is dressed in green and drunk off their asses so it’s kind of like Saint Patrick’s day and it’s AWESOME.

Then Tony meets with Steve, who offers his arm to Tony when he has to go up the compound’s slippery stairs because he’s such a sweetheart, really, and makes him pot of coffee. They sit down and make amends. They team up to lock up the Russo bothers in the floating prison facility from Civil War so they can never fuck things up again.

Peter finally gets to hug Tony properly and Tony promises they can go as Marty McFly and Doc for Halloween next year. Peter then follows Tony around saying ‘Doooc! you don’t just walk into a store and buy plutonium, Dooooc!’. Tony instantly regrets it. Pepper is laughing her ass off, totally thrilled.

Captain Marvel then is like you guys have done enough, 10 fucking years doing this shit sounds exhausting so I’ll take it from here. Tony please look after my cute cat I hear you like cats and she flies away with her super awesome flying flames and shit.

Clint gets his family back and Laura decides to adopt the OG Avengers because they’re cute so they all go to live at Clint’s farm. Steve rips logs in half with his bare hands while Tony fixes the tractor and plays with his son Morgan.

THE END.

You’re welcome.

summary: Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features
title: Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features
body:
Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features

As the plans for Disney+ continue to solidify, one exciting aspect of the upcoming streaming service for Marvel Studios fans is a series of limited-run programs based on their feature films produced directly by the studio. And as Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige told CinemaBlend, it will allow the productions to “go much, much deeper into a number of our characters and to fully intertwine…

View On WordPress
